creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 33275
Default to HC4CookieHandler

Working on migration to HTTPCLIENT 4.5.1, I updated the TestCookieManager so that it uses HC4CookieHandler instead of HC3CookieHandler.

I updated the JUNIT test code and noticed that 4 tests are failing:
- testCookies2
- testCookieOrdering1
- testCookiePolicyIgnore
- testCookiePolicy2109
